name: Freeway Traffic Rider Extreme
description:
Download this amazing Moto Racer game to feel like a true champion driving as fast as possible on the highway.

If you love traffic rider games and motorbikes, this is the game you've been waiting for!

Are you ready to be the champion of this awesome moto racer game? Are you ready to ride?

As you go faster and further on the highway you will win cash and you'll be able to buy better and faster motorbikes! Win the race buying the best motos on this moto racer game!

You can overtake the traffic cars and you will win more points and more cash!

There's no time to lose! Choose your motorbike and show everybody that no one can reach you!

◉ KEY FEATURES of this Freeway Traffic Rider ◉

- Awesome motorbikes!
- Infinite highway!
- Extreme speed!
- Four lanes highway!
- Very simple controls!
- Incredible graphics!
- Leaderboards and achievements!
- Entertaining Music!
- Free!

◉ GAMEPLAY ◉

- Tilt or Touch to steer
- Touch gas button to accelerate
- Touch brake button to slow down

◉ TIPS ◉

- The faster you drive the more points you get
- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus points and cash
- If you do overtakes fast, you can do combos and win more points

Have endless fun by downloading this Moto Racer game.

Do not forget to give us a review!
